column4: so are there any fixes for this bloody black screen issue for intel gfx?
so are there any fixes for this bloody black screen issue for intel gfx?
what issue?
upgrade via update manager to 10.04 ... boot up.. black screen. tried the i915.modeset=0 etc no good
yeah that sounds about right
i cannot even the try ubuntu bit working.. it flicks resolutions then just stays black... no disk activity etc, 9.10 was fine
how can i do thta??
how do i get the shell up?
rebooting
the file /etc/modprobe.d/i915-kms.conf doesn't exist. managed to mount the hdd
where else could it be?
what's the full line again
ok i'll reboot now
standby
lspci - if it still doesn't work, see if you can ssh into it, it'd be helpful to get dmesg info or anything
hmm when i use a failsafe graphics it goes in a loop asking me how i'd like to reconfigure my gfx
i have no idea what screen that is
tried...
it's gotta be the darn intel gfx
